name: Kenshi Online
description:
Grow as a ninja!

Get ready for an intense, action-packed adventure in our online, room-based 3D ninja game. As a skilled ninja, you'll have access to a variety of abilities, weapons, and tools to help you take down your enemies. 

Use your abilities of favourite nature and unleash your martial arts skills in epic battles against rival clans. Upgrade your skills to become the ultimate Shinobi. 

Room based experience

With multiple rooms and different gameplay modes, there's always a new challenge waiting for you. 

Join a team and work together to complete missions, or go solo and make a name for yourself!
